appShortcutName: Quod Libet - Music Library / Editor / Player
appDisplayName: Quod Libet - Music Library / Editor / Player
description:
Music player and music library manager for Linux, Windows, and macOS

Quod Libet is a cross-platform audio / music management program.
It provides many ways to view your local library, and supports streaming audio and feeds (podcasts, etc.).
It has extremely flexible metadata editing and searching capabilities.
